::Neody::

Neody groans and gets up, bruised and covered with dirt. His back was 
bleeding. He turns around, looking up at the battling ship and 
arriving bots, preparing to launch two more organic pods.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/Neody::
> 
> Killfest follows Drillbit through, firing his missile launcher at 
the Trainer base before a blast hits the ground next to him, sending 
him flying to the side. He regains balance, looking up and seeing a 
ship. He hears Cygnar's transmission, but doesn't move to retreat 
yet, firing another missile at the base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Neody's organic pods warn him of the detonating bombs before they 
are destroyed by them, the bot running back from the base. A bomb 
explodes behind him, sending him flying forward, landing on his face.
